events.message: I received my order yesterday but I want to return it because it does not meet my expectations and I would like a refund.
The case has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's message about returning their order.
The customer support agent Susan has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you would like to return your order and request a refund. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the return so I can process your refund accordingly?
Sure, my order number is 12345678. The item looks different than shown on the website and doesn’t fit well.
Thank you for the information. You can return the product within 14 days using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly. Once received, we will issue a full refund.
Thanks for the quick response! That sounds good. I’ll wait for the return label and send the item back soon.
The return label has been sent to your email address. Please contact us if you need any further assistance during the return process.
We are closing this case as your refund process has been initiated. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
